Description:
King of the Hill
With sweeping views over Hicks Reserve in Timbertop is this one of best TITLED allotments in Officer.
Site costs will be minimal on this near level allotment. A wide frontage of 15m and an area of 420sqm this premium allotment will suit a variety of home designs that will capture views to all the way to Westernport Bay.
With the second stage of Timbertop Blvd now open this fantastic opportunity is within easy access private schools, walking trails and DAngelos Winery!

Description:
Family Home with all the Upgrades
This modern and stylish home fantastically situated in the Potters Grove Estate, is sure to tick all the boxes for a vast array of buyers. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of four spacious bedrooms, two separate living zones, two bathrooms and a double car lock up garage. The moment you step foot through the home, you are greeted by high ceilings and the front formal living zone bathed in natural light, adjacent to this being the over-sized master bedroom with built in robes and ensuite featuring stone bench tops, double basin and large double shower. Moving further through the home you will find the open plan dining and lounge area, all over-looked by the highly appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, undermounted sink and walk in pantry. The further three bedrooms all in generous proportions have built in robes, accommodated by the main bathroom which features stone bench tops, a bath tub and shower. The home perfectly blends indoor and outdoor living, with sliding doors opening out to the alfresco decking area perfect for entertaining family and friends. A host of extra's include white plantation shutters throughout, high ceilings, split system cooling and ducted heating. The location is second to none, being within walking distance to the Officer train station, bus stops and within close proximity to the Monash Freeway, Beaconsfield shopping precinct, Beaconsfield Primary School and St Francis Xavier College. Contact Jack McMaster on 0468 958 463 for further information!
Insights: 10 Rosina Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
LOCATION, CLASS AND CONVENIENCE
This residence is perfect for those looking for low maintenance living with a modern flare.
Located in the fast growing and popular Arcadia Estate, you will love living just minutes from Club Officer, Officer and Cardinia Road Train Station, an array of schools, wetlands, walking tracks and local shops.
Situated on a quiet street, this wonderful home has been built to incorporate a functional and spacious design.
On entry you will love the high ceilings and tasteful colour scheme throughout the home, moving inside and to the left is a large study nook/foyer area.
At the heart of the home is the beautiful kitchen featuring stone bench top, stainless appliances, plenty of cupboard space and overlooks the main living and dining zone, which has plenty of natural light coming in.
Sliding doors lead out into the low maintenance backyard enhanced by the neat gardens and patio area.
Upstairs you will find another living zone, great for a kids play zone or converted into a theatre room.
The master boasts its own WIR and full ensuite. All additional bedrooms include BIRs and bedroom 2 also having its own balcony, great to enjoy a morning coffee. The main bathroom includes separate shower/bath, vanity and is finished with high quality fixtures and fittings.
Added features of the home include powder room downstairs, laundry, remote controlled garage, split system cooling/heating, under stair storage, walk in linen cupboard and much more.
With the Officer postcode in high demand, this is not one to be missed.
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS WELCOMED.

Description:
Pristine Living on Pioneer
This 5 year young property, presents immaculately and boasts all the modern conveniences one would desire. Indoors includes 4 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen incorporating dining and spacious family room. Features stone bench tops throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, en suite and walk in robe to master, storage galore and direct entry to the double, remote garage. Outdoor living presents to a similar calibre to indoors, featuring alfresco entertaining over looking manicured lawns and established gardens. The location offers the fortunate buyer a convenient lifestyle, situated within minutes to schooling, public transport, Monash Freeway, Beaconsfield and Officer townships.

Timbertop Estate Next To Parklands.
This lovely block is sitting pretty in the most sought after estate in Officer the Timbertop Estate.
Surrounded by many premium homes & right next to the parklands, this 544m2 block, is fenced, west facing backyard, titled and ready to build your dream home now!
With a plethora of potential it offers you the perfect opportunity. With limited stock available this block is worth an inspection.
The area has been perfectly developed to encompass family living at its finest with newly established parks, gardens, a diverse range of school options within the Officer precinct, excellent access to the freeway, Beaconsfield and Arena Shopping hubs, where the vast array of boutique and mainstream shopping will delight along with an exquisite range of eateries and cafes.

Description:
Dont Wait You Will Miss It!
Built by Carlisle Homes
Light Bright & Refreshing
Fully landscaped & easy care including vegie patch!
Exciting family floor plan & great finishes
Located in the quieter area of Officer within the peaceful Park Central Estate, and only 4 years young, we present to you this immaculate designer home loaded with quality upgrades. We begin with the spacious master with walk in robe, modern ensuite with dual vanities, double shower, separate toilet, and heated towel rail perfect on those chilly Melbourne mornings. The remaining 3 double bedrooms all with built in robes are situated at the opposite end of the house allowing optimum privacy.
The separate main bathroom is immaculate and modern, along with a very large laundry. All wet areas fitted with shiny porcelain tiles exuding luxury adding sparkle.
Great living spaces that are brilliantly designed. Private and impressive theatre/office or 5th bedroom - the choice is yours.
Onto the main hub of the household - the generous open plan family room and meals zone connects with the modern and beautifully appointed kitchen.
A cleverly designed space allowing the chef of the household to interact and oversee the rest of the family. Also perfect for the entertainer. An abundance of sparkling Caesar Stone topped benches including breakfast bar. Also a stainless Bosch dishwasher, 900mm stainless oven and range hood, stylish overhead cupboards and walk in pantry with ample storage.
Open the glass sliding doors and the merging of the alfresco is an entertainers delight, extremely stylish and family friendly living, will please families, young couples or buyers that appreciate a balance of modern living, quality design and free flowing floor plans.
Impressive feature list-
Select plantation shutters
Ducted evaporative cooling
Ducted gas heating
Timber look flooring
Double remote garage with shelving and internal access
Above standard ceiling height
Light, bright and impressive color palette throughout
Double blinds to bedrooms 2,3 and 4.
Walk to the beautiful parks, walking/bike paths, primary, secondary, public and private schools, childcare centres, proposed town centre & the train station for maximum convenience. Close entry and exit to the Monash Freeway.
Lovely family home, perfect location, the Officer confidence, no shortage of quality throughout and very well presented.
Hard to beat at this level!

Description:
ITS TITLED & READY TO BUILD ON TOMORROW!!
Reserve On Rix is more than just a home - it's a neighbourhood, a community and family.
Our neighbourhood comes with top class amenities for the locals. Reserve on Rix offers a boutique opportunity to live in an area that will fulfil all your family wishes. Officer has an exciting and vibrant hub of activity in its town centre with a buzzing town square, shops, restaurants, community centres and parklands. There are a range of Primary and Secondary Schools around Officer. Upgraded roads and freeways will link you to the city and surrounds, located approximately 40 minutes from Melbourne CBD.
315m2, 10.5m Frontage by 30 Deep, no easements, flat and ready to go!

Description:
ALL INSPECTIONS APPOINTMENT ONLY
Are you looking for a modern home but do not want to endure the stress of building? This Dennis Family home is less than a year old and has been built with quality in mind.
On first impressions the home features a timeless brick façade and landscaped gardens. On entry you will love the wide entrance hall and high ceilings.
Central to the home is the open plan kitchen including glass splash back, stone benchtop, stainless appliances and large WIP. This home is great for families as it includes two separate living zones, one at the front of the home and one at the rear, not to mention a separate study room as well.
All four bedrooms are great in size, with master including WIR and full ensuite, all additional bedrooms include BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Outside is fantastic for entertaining with great size backyard and undercover alfresco.
Added features include laundry, remote controlled garage, exposed aggregate concrete driveway, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, plenty of storage and much more.
Located in the fast growing Arcadia Estate, just minutes away from schools, M1 Entrance, local shops, Officers New Proposed Town Centre, public transport, and local parks. This home is a must inspect.
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS AVAILABLE, CONTACT AGENT TO BOOK YOUR TIME!

Description:
Row into Arena
A stylish display of single level living is on offer here in the Arena Estate, with this brilliant 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home positioned on 446sqm (approx.) block.
Young families will absolutely love this pristine property, which is sure to impresses! The master bedroom is equipped with a walk-in robe, two phase switches, a split system with an elegant ensuite and large shower, while two remaining bedrooms offer BIR with sliding doors, 1 with a ceiling fan & 1 with a split system and both bedrooms have two phase switches with having easy access to the quality neutral tone central bathroom.
The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, beautiful pendant lighting which amplifies the island bench, laminate bench tops and large fridge cavity. An expansive lounge and dining area that has incredible space with a split system and access to a large outdoor pergola area with two ceiling fans and a well-manicured garden.
Further additions include; Double glazed windows, a separate laundry, freshly painted walls, ducted heating, split systems, 12 solar panels, 7720 X 6470 garage (larger than 2 car garage) so plenty of storage space, side gate access from both sides of the house.
Situated near Officer Secondary College, Glenvale College (Cardinia campus), St. Clare's Primary School, Arena Shopping Centre, Arena Park, Heatherbrae Recreation Reserve, buses, Officer Station and easy access to Princes Highway.
Be quick to book your private inspection as opportunities like this do not last long!

This modern home built by local builder SJD Homes combines all of the luxuries you would be searching for, from its striking façade to manicured gardens, all you need to be is simply move in and enjoy.
The home has a well designed floorplan with open plan living area to the front, as well as second living zone with raked ceiling adding to the appeal.

Adding to the excitement of the home is the oversized alfresco and great size backyard to entertain family/guests.

Located in the popular Arcadia Estate, you will love being within walking distances of Officer Train Station, Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary College, Officers New Proposed Town Centre, local parks and much more.

Description:
Breathtakingly Stunning With Side Access!
Over 27 squares of luxury built by Kialla
Every upgrade imaginable
Side access for trailer, camper & boat
Wonderful floorplan & amazing finish
This home is one of the most stunning you will see, built to the highest of standards with every upgrade imaginable. Inside you will experience a mix of luxurious finishes with a calming colour palette.
Six star in finish and building compliance with 4 double bedrooms all on a 574m2 block. The glorious master suit offers his and her walk in robes, plantation shutters & soft furnishings. Penthouse inspired ensuite with dual vanities on a stone bench top, floor to ceiling tiles and a secluded shower. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 come with fully fitted out built in robes with mirror finish sliders. There is a separate powder room, main bathroom also with a stone bench top and floor to ceiling tiles that are equally immaculate and modern.
The living spaces are perfectly executed with a separate Theatre Room complete with floor to ceiling remote block out blinds. A generous open plan family room with an inbuilt wood fireplace, adjoining a huge meals space, connects the modern and amazingly appointed kitchen. The kitchen comes complete with an abundance of storage with a plethora of draws and cupboard space, mirror finish splash back, waterfall island stone bench top, 900mm oven, water point for fridge and a butlers pantry with a dishwasher and further storage.
Enjoy year round entertaining with a decked alfresco that features aluminium bifold doors, whilst overlooking the beautiful manicured turf and garden.
This is simply the perfect home with amazing energy and space, with the standout theme of quality and incredible style.
Highlights-
Immaculate presentation inside and out
4 x Reverse Cycle Split systems
Ducted Gas heating
Wood fireplace
9ft high ceilings and high flush panel doors throughout
Timber lined feature ceiling niche in the entry
Top quality window furnishings
Timber look flooring and luxurious thick carpet
Oversized double remote garage, with rear roller door and internal door access
Fitted out laundry
Insulation in internal and external walls
Stunning lighting throughout
Side access to the backyard through double gates
A short walk to the parks, cafes, future town centre, private and public schools, with the Officer and Beaconsfield train stations both very easy to access.
A JAW DROPPING HOME WITH ALL THE X-FACTORS
Internal area
250.83m²

Description:
Modern Living In A Central Location!
*** PLEASE CONTACT US TO ORGANISE A VIEWING OF THE PROPERTY. DESPITE NOT BEING DIRECTLY AFFECTED BY THE VIRUS IN ANY WAY, WE HAVE INCREASED HYGIENE PROCEDURES AT ALL OF INSPECTIONS FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE. THIS IS TO ENSURE A CLEAN AND SAFE ENVIRONMENT FOR OUR CUSTOMERS AND PEOPLE. REST ASSURED OUR DUTY OF CARE IS TO ALWAYS SERVE OUR CUSTOMERS AND THE COMMUNITIES IN WHICH WE OPERATE WITH VIGILANCE. ***
Located in a terrific spot within the highly sought after Arena estate within walking distance to shops, schools, public transport, walking tracks and only under 1km away from freeway access is this well presented modern townhouse that is sure to tick all the boxes.
Featuring three good sized bedrooms, including master bedroom with ensuite and triple built in robe, the remaining two bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom. All bedrooms have panel heating. All three bedrooms are located upstairs and are complimented by a study/TV area.
The hub of the home is downstairs with a modern designed open planned kitchen, dining and living zone. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including oven, cook top, range hood and dishwasher, there is also an island bench plus an abundance of cupboard space. This overlooks the dining area which flows into the living zone which features a split system air conditioner. Other features include internal laundry, a third toilet located downstairs, internal access from the double car garage on remote plus quality fixtures and fittings.
Stepping outside you'll find yourself in your own private courtyard with a decking area and low maintenance garden offered.
With a desirable location, all the modern features you'll need inside plus a great design on a low maintenance block, this home is sure to impress a variety of buyers so don't miss your chance to purchase. Book an inspection today or see you at the next open for inspection.
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
What A Location What A Buy!
Prime Arena Living
3 Bedrooms plus Study
Low Maintenance & Easy Care
Downsize, First Home or Add to Portfolio
The best location in Arena for convenience directly only a short walk and you are at the Arena Shopping Centre, kinder, childcare centre, Lakeside Primary, St Francis College and the train station.
Modern lifestyle, this lovely presented home 3 double bedrooms plus a separate study/computer nook space, the master with walk in robe, built in robe & ensuite, bedrooms 2 & 3 has built in robes, main bathroom with dual vanities.
Living space is super with a generous open plan family room & adjoining meals zone, separate retreat or study space is great, the modern kitchen with great storage, dishwasher, 900mm oven, stone bench tops, and pantry.
Enjoy year round entertaining with the beautiful decking, synthetic turf is on trend. A perfect easy living home with great energy, space, & style.
Highlights-
Timber look flooring
Ducted gas heating
Above standard ceiling height
Select plantation shutters
Quality security doors
Evaporative cooling
Solar hot water
NBN
6 star energy
Double remote garage with internal access
A great home, well presented, superior location and great buying at this level!

Description:
An Arena Spectacular
Located in the sought after Arena Estate in Officer is this spectacular built one of a kind home. Within walking distance to everything you could possibly need you will fall in love with the active lifestyle the home will bring.
An abundance of living space is showcased with this very clever double story layout having a very versatile floorplan that will allow the large family to enjoy.
The home has 2 to 3 separate living zones including a separate theatre downstairs, large stone kitchen with huge island bench, dishwasher and walk in pantry.
The home features 4 or 5 bedrooms the master with full ensuite and double walk in robes while all other additional bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom and additional toilet. Car accommodation is taken care of with the double remote garage offering internal access. This home is low maintenance yet so spacious and presents extreme value to the current market. An inspection will impress as there are too many features and inclusions to list. Private inspections are allowed and are definitely welcomed.
Please call Matt Ketteringham 0412 930 177 and make this happen
